description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle against 15 other players in this World War II shooter featuring classic weapons of the day.  Upgrade your weapons, earn perks and rewards while progressing through the ranks.  COD players will feel right at home in this action packed game set in the streets of a European village.
